data.text: @LemSip27 It hurts to see these children. I feel bad about it thou😓

@20ThousandFeet @Sportydoodle @LemSip27 Who said anything about the UK? :P, Honestly apart from donating to Ukrainian charities and pressuring our own governments through emails, letters, phones calls etc to support the Ukraine. I'm not sure what to do. Any military action by outside forces would escalate things.

@Arrith @Sportydoodle @LemSip27 a) so I see, with two instant replies in denial needing reporting/blocking.

b) If our own govt won’t do more than shining coloured lights, how do we help? The UK govt is almost compliant with Putin?
Just like Russia, those in command make the decisions.

Learn from this war!

@20ThousandFeet @Sportydoodle @LemSip27 It doesn't put shit in it's place, those people won't listen to any amount of reason, but this photo is so incredibly sad,  Those kids, their families and the brave Men and Women fighting are going through hell. Fucking christ we need to do better and help.
@carolJhedges @Frances86878358 I know Carol...the absolute innocents and what they are having to face.
@LemSip27 @Frances86878358 downloaded pic. Am crying so much. These could be my granddaughter ...some look just like her.
@20ThousandFeet @Sportydoodle @LemSip27 It’s a fake image you mouth breather
